**Example 1: BindAccount**



Input: 

```
tccli cpdp BindAccount --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --PhoneNum xx \
    --AnchorId xx \
    --TransferType 1 \
    --AccountNo xx
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "ErrMessage": "xx",
        "Result": null,
        "RequestId": "xx",
        "ErrCode": "xx"
    }
}
```
